name: CheerfulPals [Demo]
description:
And evil being prepared in your world and cursed all of your pals. and turned them into skeletons. Now you must cheer up your pals to heal their hearts and defeat your enemies and the Wicked Evil.

Currently technically this isn't finish due me getting covid 5 days ago but I hope you pals enjoy it either way :D

Controls:

A:Move Left W:Cheer Pal D:Move Right RMB: direct Pal
